snippet.title: Catizens — New Teaser
snippet.description:
HeroCraft PC welcomes all cat lovers to the fuzzy world of Catizens! We are meowst excited to present a new teaser trailer for Catizens, a colony management game where you watch over a group of quirky and disobedient cats trying to save their kingdom.

Wishlist Catizens on Steam → https://bit.ly/CaTiEIS 

In this video, we show off the main gameplay features of Catizens. Customize your fluffy catventurers, watch them develop relationships, gather resources, fight against the wilderness, and build the most pawsome settlement.
